text: Alan Michael Smith (born 1 September 1950) is an English former amateur footballer who played as a winger in the Football League for York City, and in non-League football for Harrogate Railway Athletic, Bradford Park Avenue, Bridlington Town, Ossett Albion and Harrogate Town. He joined Harrogate as player-manager in 1979, before retiring from playing in 1984. He served as general manager from 1990 to 1991 before taking as team manager again in 1994. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Harrogate Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Harrogate Railway Athletic F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:Bradford (Park Avenue) A.F.C. players Category:Bridlington Town A.F.C. players Category:Ossett Albion A.F.C. players Category:Harrogate Town A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:English football managers Category:Harrogate Town A.F.C. managers Category:Footballers from Yorkshire Category:Association football midfielders
title: Alan Smith (footballer, born 1950)
